info.info: this part is to comment on each variable. This part is not used in game ui, so can be used to explain settings this file
info.decks: for card decks with shuffle and draw
info.deck_load_from: option for loading deck from external data. i.e. Yu-gi-oh/HeartStone user decks
info.name: name to call object in the game. Used if language is set to default. Else, corresponding value in the language package (selected by lang_tag) is used
info.cards: card infos if load_from is false or omitted
info.lang_tag: unique tag to use in language packages
